1. City Council

City Council
============

[View Other Recent City Council and/or Board and Commission Meetings](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/videos)

![Join a City Council Meeting Opens in new window](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=5638 "Join a City Council Meeting")

![horizontal divider](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=5213)


| Name | Place | Term |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mayor Brad Horton (since 2024) | Mayor | 2024–2026 |
| David Glover (since 2023) | Place 1 | 2025–2027 |
| Thelma Kobeck (Since 2024) | Place 2 | 2024–2026 |
| Kenneth Michels (since 2022) | Place 3 | 2025–2027 |
| Vacant | Place 4 | 2024-2026 |
| Jeff Nevarez (since 2023) | Place 5 | 2025–2027 |

* [City Hall Council Chambers](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/facilities.aspx?page=detail&RID=3)
* [The Mayor and Council are elected officials](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/election)
* [Apply for appointment to Vacant Position](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/boardapp)



The City Council consists of six members — a
[Mayor](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/262/Mayor)
and five Council members who are
elected
at-large and serve two-year terms. There are no term limits. The Mayor presides at
meetings
and is recognized as the head of the city government. The Mayor has the right to vote only in the event of a tie but does have veto power. The City Council members elect one member as Mayor Pro
Tem to preside over meetings in the Mayor's absence.
The Mayor Pro Tem retains the right to vote. Current City Council members are listed above.

All powers of the city are vested in the City Council. Council exercises these powers to ensure the performance of all duties and obligations imposed on the city by law and the city's own
Home Rule Charter
. The City Council's powers include but are not limited to:

* Establishing compensation rates for all city officers
* Assigning duties and powers to city officers, departments, and agencies
* Establishing the city boundaries

   Mayor

3. #### Thelma Kobeck

   City Council, Place 2

   [Email Councilmember Kobeck - tkobeck@cityofkenneda](mailto:tkobeck@cityofkennedale.com)
4. #### Kenneth Michels

   City Council, Place 3

   [Email Councilmember Michels - kmichels@cityofkenne](mailto:kmichels@cityofkennedale.com)

   City Council, Place 5

6. #### City Administration

   Phone:
   817-985-2105

   Fax: 817-478-4309

The Kennedale City Council received a Texas Municipal League (
)
Municipal Excellence Award
in 2010
